Package database

Class Query

java.lang.Object
database.Query
public class Query
extends java.lang.Object
Class that unifies all the queries that are used during the run of the system.
Author:
Aviv

      public static java.sql.ResultSet SelectTableWhere​(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String column, java.lang.String item)
      SELECT * FROM table WHERE column = item.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the table name in the database.
      column - name of the column.
      item - object for comparison.
      Returns:
      returns full row from the database .

    • getTestByExecutionCode

      public static java.sql.ResultSet getTestByExecutionCode​(java.lang.String testExecCode)
      SELECT * FROM test WHERE isActivated=true AND currEcecCode=test execution code.
      Parameters:
      testExecCode - test execution code.
      Returns:
      returns row of test from the database in which the test is currently active and with the specific test execution code.
